attributes.action: All MPs should read the commentary by Peter Oborne and write a summary about it
attributes.additional_details:
All MPs should read the article written by Peter Oborne on the moral decay of our society and all MPs should write a summary for this article.
Link for the article (http://blogs.telegraph.co.uk/news/peteroborne/100100708/the-moral-decay-of-our-society-is-as-bad-at-the-top-as-the-bottom/)
